DESCRIPTION: A #yStance which modifies how certain cards function.
Gain X [blademaster:WindChargeIcon] in [#00FF2A]Wind[] [#00FF2A]Stance[]. NL Gain X [blademaster:LightningChargeIcon] in [#4A8CFF]Lightning[] [#4A8CFF]Stance[].
Some #yStance cards have bonuses that depend on these. NL Gain #yCharges by playing #yConduit cards.
#yBleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, and take #b20% more damage from attacks. Each turn, #yBleeding is reduced by #b3.
Requires [#FF4500]Fury[] or [#860037]Combo[] to be played. #yFinishers cannot generate [#FF4500]Fury[] and [#860037]Combo[].
Used for #yFinishers. Gain [#FF4500]Fury[] by dealing attack damage. #yFinishers cannot generate [#FF4500]Fury[].
Used for #yFinishers. Gain [#860037]Combo[] by playing cards. #yFinishers cannot generate [#860037]Combo[].
Applies if the target is at or below #b60% HP.
